article_title: Barb Gerken promoted at First Insurance Group
article_text:
Defiance, OH (43512)

Today

Partly cloudy early followed by scattered thunderstorms this afternoon. High 84F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 68F. Winds light and variable.

og.description: Barb Gerken has been promoted vice president, director of employee benefit compliance at First Insurance Group. Gerken has more than 28 years of industry experience; her primary responsibility will be
